data.message: Once a month friends go litter picking. I asked them to keep an eye out for Coke rubbish. They called me over to photograph cans left to join the Anthropocene. Why don't your cans implore people to recycle? Why don't you tell them the embodied energy and the total carbon footprint of the processes?

replies.message: Hi John, thanks for getting in touch. We have a new plan to see all of our packaging recovered so that none ends up where it shouldn’t. The first step is to double the amount of recycled plastic in our bottles to 50% by 2020. We’ll also launch our biggest ever ad campaign to inspire more of our consumers to recycle and champion new ways to improve packaging recovery. For more info, please visit: http://spr.ly/61878SCwJ
